snippet: A court ruling that equated circumcision with a criminal act has sent ripples of anger and anxiety, raising vexing questions about the boundaries of religious freedom in modern Germany.
abstract: German court ruling that equates circumcision with bodily harm and a criminal act has sent ripples of anger and anxiety among Jews and Muslims, raising vexing questions about the boundaries of religious freedom in in the nation.
lead_paragraph: A court ruling that equated circumcision with a criminal act has sent ripples of anger and anxiety, raising vexing questions about the boundaries of religious freedom in modern Germany.

headline.seo: In Germany, Ruling Over Circumcision Sows Anxiety and Confusion
headline.main: In Germany, Ruling Over Circumcision Sows Anxiety and Confusion
headline.print_headline: Ruling on Circumcision Leaves German Jews And Muslims Anxious
